name: Muse Entertainment
tag_list: production-company, tv-production-company, film-video-production, muse-movie, tv-production, film-production-company, muse-tv, film-distribution
overview:
Internationally acclaimed Film and TV Production Company

Founded in 1998, Muse Entertainment is a film and TV production company that is recognized across North America and internationally as a major producer of well-crafted, high-quality film and television productions with strong international appeal.

TV productions that win over critics and audiences throughout the world

Muse film and TV production company produces a wide range of dramatic series, television movies, mini-series and family programs for major networks around the world. Many of our television productions have garnered critical acclaim and large audiences – as well over 100 international awards and over 300 award nominations!

Quality Productions for U.S. Television Networks

In 2007, Muse opened offices in Los Angeles. As a result, our TV production company now has a large volume of projects in development and in production with free and cable television networks in the United States.

A leader in Co-productions and International Partnerships

Muse has become one of the most active film and TV production companies in the world. We combine our vast knowledge of international laws and practices with our thorough understanding of Canada’s tax credits, television funds and other forms of financial assistance.

Under Canada’s official film production treaties, Muse has produced with companies in France, England, Ireland, Spain, Germany, Switzerland, Romania, Hungary, Morocco, Australia and South Africa, amortizing costs of production over a wider audience base and qualifying for the fiscal advantages offered for official co-productions. Our production company prides itself on its ability to bring creative, artistic, technical and financial resources together.

Muse has development and production offices in Montreal, Toronto and Los Angeles.
